basic_information.scholarship_name: The Ragland Family Education Foundation Scholarship

description: To provide financial assistance to Oklahoma students with limited educational funding who want to obtain a college degree in STEM. This scholarship is an external scholarship and the application can be found at: raglandfamilyfoundation.com The deadline for the application is March 15, 2023

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
